components.name: Normal PV
components.description: A PV calculation tool according to Eqt. A.10 in doi: 10.1016/j.apenergy.2019.03.177

inputs.name: A
inputs.description: Area of PV system in [m²].Default is 1.0

inputs.name: eta_PVref
inputs.description: Reference PV efficiency under NOCT in [-]. Default is 0.15

inputs.name: NOCT
inputs.description: Nominal operating cell temperature in [°C]. Default is 45.0

inputs.name: T_amb
inputs.description: Ambient temperature hourly time series, 8760 entries, in [°C]

inputs.name: I
inputs.description: Solar irradiance on the panel. Time series with 8760 entries, in [W/m²]

outputs.name: Elec
outputs.description: Electricity generated by PV panel. Time series with 8760 entries, in [kWh]

outputs.name: effic
outputs.description: Temperature dependent efficiency of PV module. Time series with 8760 entries, in [kWh]
